item.title: Can someone help me? 3 errors
item.dc:creator: @IamMutedAtm IamMutedAtm
item.description:
@IamMutedAtm wrote:

[quote=“jinglesassy, post:7, topic:172984”]now i get this:

client.java:13541: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

and the code is

[code]public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

if (amount > 0) {
if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
if (!takeAsNote) {
if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
} else {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
}
} else {
while (amount>0) {
if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
{
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
{
bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
amount–;
}
else{
amount = 0;
}
}
else amount=0;
}
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
}

			else if (takeAsNote && Item.itemIsNote[bankItems[fromSlot]])
			{
				//if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				//{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount)
					{
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],amount))
						{
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],bankItemsN[fromSlot]))
						{
									bankItems[fromSlot]=0;
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]=0;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
			}
			else
			{
				sendMessage("Item can't be drawn as note.");
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount)
					{
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount))
						{
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot]))
						{
									bankItems[fromSlot]=0;
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]=0;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				}
				else
				{
					while (amount>0)
					{
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
						{
									if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}
						}
						else amount=0;
					}
					resetBank();
					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

[/code][/quote]

This means you missed a “}” somewhere in one of your commands or something, its happened to me a few times.
What was the last thing you changed?

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me? 3 errors
item.dc:creator: @jinglesassy jinglesassy
item.description:
@jinglesassy wrote:

now i get this:

client.java:13541: illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^
1 error
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .

and the code is

[code]public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

if (amount > 0) {
if (bankItems[fromSlot] > 0){
if (!takeAsNote) {
if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1]) {
if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount) {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount)) {
bankItemsN[fromSlot] -= amount;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
} else {
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot])) {
bankItems[fromSlot] = 0;
bankItemsN[fromSlot] = 0;
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
}
} else {
while (amount>0) {
if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
{
if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
{
bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
amount–;
}
else{
amount = 0;
}
}
else amount=0;
}
resetBank();
resetItems(5064);
}
}

			else if (takeAsNote && Item.itemIsNote[bankItems[fromSlot]])
			{
				//if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				//{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount)
					{
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],amount))
						{
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (addItem(bankItems[fromSlot],bankItemsN[fromSlot]))
						{
									bankItems[fromSlot]=0;
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]=0;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
			}
			else
			{
				sendMessage("Item can't be drawn as note.");
				if (Item.itemStackable[bankItems[fromSlot]+1])
				{
					if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > amount)
					{
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),amount))
						{
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]-=amount;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
					else
					{
						if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),bankItemsN[fromSlot]))
						{
									bankItems[fromSlot]=0;
									bankItemsN[fromSlot]=0;
									resetBank();
									resetItems(5064);
						}
					}
				}
				else
				{
					while (amount>0)
					{
						if (bankItemsN[fromSlot] > 0)
						{
									if (addItem((bankItems[fromSlot]-1),1))
									{
										bankItemsN[fromSlot]+=-1;
										amount--;
									}
									else{
										amount = 0;
									}
						}
						else amount=0;
					}
					resetBank();
					resetItems(5064);
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

[/code]

item.title: Can someone help me? 3 errors
item.dc:creator: @IamMutedAtm IamMutedAtm
item.description:
@IamMutedAtm wrote:

[quote=“jinglesassy, post:5, topic:172984”]ctrl+g does not open any window and ps i am useing regular note pad[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2008, 02:55:03 AM[/size][hr]well i found those and fixed it but now i get a new error,

client.java:13419: ‘catch’ without ‘try’
} catch (IOException ioe) {
^
client.java:13419: ‘;’ expected
} catch (IOException ioe) {
^
client.java:13421: illegal start of type
} finally {
^
3 errors
Files Compiled Successfully!
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

You press ctrl + g whilst in notepad, your client.java

Are you trying to make a command or something?

Also you should try adding
try {

before the rest of your code since that’s what the error is looking like to me.

Post again and I’ll help you fix it.
